N'oge oge mbụ nke ọchịchị Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu n'afọ 1999, e mepụtara Ministry of Special Duties and Inter-Governmental Relations site na Gọvanọ's Office's political and General Administration Office.

E mechara tinye ngalaba okike ọrụ na Ministri ahụ n'ọnwa Ọgọọst afọ 2004, site n'afọ 2006 ruo n'afọ 2010, Ministri ahụ na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ Eko Engineering Ventures Limited, nke e nyere ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze maka ịmegharị ya n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ ala na ebe nnweta nkà na mmekorita ya na ụlọ ọrụ onwe a ma ama.

E mere ka ikike nke Ministrị ahụ gbasaa site na nguzobe nke Lagos State Emergency Management Agency (LASEMA) na kọmitii nchekwa, nke abụọ na-ahụ maka imeghachi omume na igbochi ọdachi na steeti ma nọrọ n'okpuru nlekọta nke Ministrụ ahụ.
Onye njikwa nchekwa lekwasịrị anya n'echiche atụmatụ na atụmatụ n'ime ebe nyocha na mmepe siri ike ebe nchekwa ga-abụ omenala n'etiti gọọmentị na ndị dị mkpa.

Iji rụọ ọrụ nke ọma ma wuo mmekọrịta kwesịrị ekwesị n'etiti Ministry of Special Duties and Intergovernmental Relations, MDAs, ndị isi na-etinye aka, na ọha na eze n'ozuzu iji mepụta ebe dị nchebe na nke na-enweghị ọdachi site na iji Innovation, Research, na Development.
